moduleSpec.desc: Jianzi notation (for Chinese Guqin) repertoire component declarations.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, Xian(string) number attribute values for the Jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: The first Xian of Guqin.
The second Xian of Guqin.
The third Xian of Guqin.
The fourth Xian of Guqin.
The fifth Xian of Guqin.
The sixth Xian of Guqin.
The seventh Xian of Guqin.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, Hui position (the position on the string) attribute values for the Jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: The first Hui position of Guqin.
The second Hui position of Guqin.
The third Hui position of Guqin.
The fourth Hui position of Guqin.
The fifth Hui position of Guqin.
The sixth Hui position of Guqin.
The seventh Hui position of Guqin.
The eight Hui position of Guqin.
The ninth Hui position of Guqin.
The tenth Hui position of Guqin.
The eleventh Hui position of Guqin.
The twelveth Hui position of Guqin.
The thirteenth Hui position of Guqin.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, FEN postition(fractional position between two Hui postition.

valItem.desc: equals to the current Hui position.
current Hui position plus one-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus two-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus three-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus four-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus five-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus six-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus seven-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus eight-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.
current Hui position plus nine-tenth of the distance between two Hui positions.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, the finger of the left hand attribute values for the Jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: The thumb finger of left hand.
The index finger of left hand.
The middle finger of left hand.
The ring finger of left hand.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, the preform technique of the left hand attribute values for the jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: Flex the ring finger of the left hand and press the string with the outer side of the last joint.
The left hand moves to the right to the desired pitch thus creating an upward glissando.
The left hand moves to the left of the desired pitch thus creating a sliding tone.
The left hand presses the string and makes a continuous swing on both sides of the position, i.e. the vibrato of a general string instrument.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, the perform technique of the right hand attribute values for the jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: Right hand thumb plucks the string outward.
Right hand thumb plucks the string inward.
Right hand index finger plucks the string outward.
Right hand index finger plucks the string inward.
Right hand middle finger plucks the string outward.
Right hand middle finger plucks the string inward.
Right hand ring finger plucks the string outward.
Right hand ring finger plucks the string inward.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, the perform item attribute values for jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: Small pause.
Perform quickly.
Perform slowly.
Perform slighly.
Perform hardly.
The end.

macroSpec.desc: Logical, that is, written, the tuning attribute values for jianzi repertoire.

valItem.desc: Equals to C major.
Equals to B flat major.
Equals to G major.
Equals to F major.
Equals to E flat major.

Analytical domain attributes that describe the properties of a left hand gesture in the jianzi repertoire.

Analytical domain attributes that describe the properties of a left hand technique in the jianzi repertoire.

Analytical domain attributes that describe the properties of a left hand finger in the jianzi repertoire.
Gestural domain attributes that describe the properties of a Xian in the jianzi repertoire.

Analytical domain attributes that describe the properties of a Xian in the jianzi repertoire.

elementSpec.desc: The basic building block of Jianzi repertoire.

remarks.p: Guqin Jianzi repertoire is gesture based notation system. Each Puzi contains right hand gesture and left hand gesture.

elementSpec.desc: The right hand gesture of Puzi.

remarks.p: The gesture of right hand in each Puzi contains the number of Xian(string) and the perform technique of right hand.

elementSpec.desc: The left hand gesture of Puzi.

remarks.p: The gesture of left hand in each Puzi contains the number of Xian(string), the perform technique of left hand, the Hui(string position) of the Xian, and the finger of the left hand.

elementSpec.desc: The right hand perform technique of Puzi.

attDef.desc: The preform technique Jianzi of right hand.

elementSpec.desc: The left hand perform technique of Puzi.

attDef.desc: The preform technique Jianzi of left hand.

elementSpec.desc: The left hand finger of Puzi.

attDef.desc: The name of left hand finger.

elementSpec.desc: The number of Xian(string number) in Puzi.
The specific Hui position in Puzi.
The Perform item in Jianzi repertoire.
